PHRASE.LANG: Moored by a tropical island, this ship comes complete with playable cannon mini-game. A very desirable residence that has suddenly become available, due to the imprisonment of the previous owner.
Ancré près d’une île tropicale, ce bateau complet propose également un mini-jeu de canons. Cette demeure de rêve est désormais disponible, suite à l’emprisonnement de son ex-propriétaire.
Ormeggiata presso un'isola tropicale, questa nave comprende un mini-gioco di cannoni. Una residenza molto desiderata che è diventata disponibile grazie all'arresto del suo precedente proprietario.

Dieses Schiff hat an einer tropischen Insel festgemacht und kommt mit einem spielbaren Kanonen-Minispiel. Eine sehr gesuchte Unterkunft wurde plötzlich frei, da der Vorbesitzer ins Gefängnis gewandert ist.
Amarrado en una isla tropical, este barco viene con un divertido mini juego con cañones.Debido al encarcelamiento del antiguo propietario, una deseable residencia está ahora disponible.
Moored by a tropical island, this ship comes complete with playable cannon mini-game. A very desirable residence that has suddenly become available, due to the imprisonment of the previous owner.
Moored by a tropical island, this ship comes complete with playable cannon mini-game. A very desirable residence that has suddenly become available, due to the imprisonment of the previous owner.
